## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7e9a17e9a163a67c876d4a9937c41e8711d220ae05d890281acec9edbf9986cf)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@fandom-frontend/react-common' @ 100.100.106 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
